Category.SubtypeAmmoHint: The ammunition type determines which weapons can make use of it.
Category.SubtypeArmorHint: The type of armor this is, which decides how it is equipped.
Category.SubtypeElixirHint: The type of elixir this is.
Category.SubtypeShieldHint: The shield type determines how much it protects the wielder.
Category.SubtypeSpellHint: The spell type determines how it affects enemies and allies.
Category.SubtypeWeaponHint: The weapon type determines the ammunition it can use.

Range.ValueHint: The maximum range of the item.

Price.ValueHint: The deemed value of the item.

Blast.SizeHint: The size of the accompanying blast zone when using this ammunition.
Blast.TypeHint: The shape of the blast zone.

Weight.ValueHint: The amount that this item contributes to its owner's encumbrance.

Quantity.ValueHint: The size of this stack of items.

Override.GroupHint: The group of damage types that this ammunition will override the type of.
Override.ValueHint: The new damage type that will be used in place of the overridden group.

Armor.ValueHint: The armor value of this item, which reduces incoming physical damage.

Wield.ValueHint: The number of hands required to handle this item.

Template.TypesHint: The shape or type of targeting of this spell.

Usage.ValueHint: The number of remaining uses of this item.
Usage.MaxHint: The total number of uses of this item.

EffectProperty.ExpirationHint: The trigger for when this effect will expire.
EffectProperty.SubtypeFusionHint: The properties available to choose from, derived from the chosen item subtype.

WeaponUseDialog.Title: {name}: Attack
WeaponUseDialog.AmmunitionHint: An optional ammunition to use for this attack, which will alter the damage roll.

ItemFusionChanges.Name.Label: Name
ItemFusionChanges.Image.Label: Image
ItemFusionChanges.Price.Label: Price
ItemFusionChanges.Price.ADD: The price of the item will increase by {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Price.OVERRIDE: The price of the item will become {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Weight.Label: Weight
ItemFusionChanges.Weight.ADD: The weight of the item will increase by {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Weight.OVERRIDE: The weight of the item will become {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Armor.Label: Armor
ItemFusionChanges.Armor.ADD: The armor value of the item will increase by {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Armor.OVERRIDE: The armor value of the item will become {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Resistance.Label: {type} Resistance
ItemFusionChanges.Resistance.ADD: The item will grant an additional {change} points of {type} resistance.
ItemFusionChanges.Resistance.OVERRIDE: The item will grant {change} points of {type} resistance.
ItemFusionChanges.Range.Label: Range
ItemFusionChanges.Range.ADD: The range of the item will increase by {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Range.OVERRIDE: The range of the item will become {change}.
ItemFusionChanges.Wield.Label: Wielding
ItemFusionChanges.Wield.OVERRIDE: The item will require using one hand to wield.
ItemFusionChanges.WieldPl.OVERRIDE: The item will require using two hands to wield.
ItemFusionChanges.Damage.Label: Damage
ItemFusionChanges.Damage.ADD: The item will deal an additional {change} damage.

Setting.CircularTokensHint: Are tokens treated as circular for the purpose of their hit area?
Setting.TemplateAreaThresholdHint: The percentage a token must overlap a template to be considered 'inside' it. The default is 0.4.
Setting.TokenBarLengthHint: The length of token bars, in degrees. The default is 120.

Warning.ItemHasNoTemplateTypes: This item has no template types set!
Warning.ItemIsNotEquipped: The item must be equipped to be used!
Warning.NotEnoughPips: You do not have enough pips remaining to make an attack!
Warning.AlreadyAtMaxHealth: {name} is already at their maximum health.
Warning.FieldOverridden: This field has been disabled as it is being modified by an effect.
Warning.InvalidActiveEffectType: The chosen effect type is not valid for this parent.
Warning.NoAvailableEquipment: You have no available equipment of that type.
